text: Once Around is a 1991 American romantic comedy drama movie directed by Lasse Hallström and starring Holly Hunter, Danny Aiello, Richard Dreyfuss, Griffin Dunne, Laura San Giacomo, Gena Rowlands. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1991 comedy-drama movies Category:1991 romantic comedy movies Category:1991 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Lasse Hallström Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Boston Category:Movies about families
title: Once Around
